com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast

Interface IStringScalarFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFilterElement, IScalarFunction, ISelectionElement, IString

    public interface IStringScalarFunction
extends IScalarFunction, IString
    Represents a scalar function that operates on a character string. LOCATE, UPPER, LOWER and SUBSTRING are the supported string scalar functions. A scalar function can appear in the selection or the filter clause of a query.

    Instances of StringScalarFunction can be created using the methods defined in a IStringField. For example, to convert the value of a field to upper case, use IString._upper()

    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    IStringField

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast.IString
